Customer_Reviews: I’m a delivery driver so I’m on my feet all day. I’ve been wearing this nearly every day all day of the week for a good two months now. They’re more comfortable than my last pair of barefoot shoes and look stylish as an added bonus. The only thing is the upper sides of the shoe where you put your feet into are getting a little wrinkled but wear and tear on any shoe is inevitable. Would buy another pair.

As others have mentioned, the lacing design of these shoes are not good. The laces are difficult to tighten and loosen, and create weird pressure points when tied. The Primus Lite Knit is far more comfortable and easy to get on and off. Would not recommend the Primus Lite III

Las tallas son mentira pedí 29 cm y me llego una talla 44 europea qué según la Marca equivale a 27.5 cm, aun por encima al devolverlos he perdido el dinero correspondiente a los impuestos de importación, pésima información y pésimo servicio de devolución. Si pudiera poner 0 estrellas eso pondría.

Die Produktbilder für die weiße Variante entsprechen nicht dem tatsächlichen Produkt, denn leider ist der weiße Schuh zweifarbig: Alle Gummibestandteile setzen sich gelblich erheblich ab. Schade, sehr schade, meine Vorfreude war groß. Nach höflicher Rückfrage beim Händler, ob ein Produktionsfehler vorläge, kam keine Antwort. Also danke für nichts. Zur Größe noch: Ich trage normalerweise zwischen 41 bis 42 und der Schuh hier war mir in der Größe 41 mind. eine Nummer zu groß.
Gutes Barfussgefühl, angenehm zu tragen, Gies Preis- Leistungsverhältnis
Dont know about these shoes they did not fit

Surprisingly comfortable considering these shoes have zero extra padding. Perfect for the gym. The toe box shape is unusual looking (but actually more naturally contoured for the foot shape). Highly recommend for fitness people that want to improve their foot health.

Had my knee rebuilt, physical therapist recommended the shoes. Left off the part about do not wear barefooted, both pinky toes bleeding after 1 mile hike. Please wear socks. Knee surgery made me go past my window of return. Hurting toes

I had such high hopes for these shoes, as well as another model made by the same compny.

I needed a pair for work (surgery) and home use. As far as working goes, I have to stand for hours straight in the same few square feet.

These shoes are unbareable to wear. Too tight in the toe box, no matter how thin the socks are. I can wear for 30 minutes barefoot, but then my big toe joint starts hurting from the pressure, and I start to have the zingy-nerve-feeling when wearing any longer. I loosened the laces, but didnt feel better.
I even bought a shoe stretcher, since I made the mistake of wearing the shoes for a day, and cannot return them. These shoes depress me every time I look at them. Can't return them. Can't wear them without feeling like I'm undergoing torture. Soooo much money wasted.
Se ven muy bien, esperar los primeros meses de uso para ver cómo se sienten, muy demorada la entrega por parte del vendedor, debería ser más claro con los tiempos
